creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
markings: bottom of each block marked with letter depicting its order in printmaking process in black marker: a, b, c, d, or e; on back of frame in pen, LR: [A]; LL: [B]
signed: bottom margin of print, in pencil: [Haha a/p Micah 1982]
title: Print blocks (gendai hanga)
